term.title: conductivity

item.text: Reciprocal of resistivity. This quantity is a tensor in an anisotropic medium. It was formerly called specific conductance.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 957. 'Glossary of terms in quantities and units in Clinical Chemistry (IUPAC-IFCC Recommendations 1996)' on page 967 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668040957)
